articles.content:
'Nope'
Universal
In holdover news for the Friday box office, Jordan Peeles Nope took a sizable 70% drop with a $5.84 million day-eight gross. That brings its domestic cume to $67.8 million, essenti… [+3513 chars]

articles.title: 'Leave It to Beaver': A look back at the cast of the beloved TV show - Fox News
articles.description: "Leave It to Beaver" entertained the nation from 1957 to 1963. See where case members are now, 59 years after the beloved sitcom left the airwaves in 1963.
articles.content:
The 1957 sitcom "Leave It to Beaver" followed Theodore "Beaver" Cleaver on his adventures around his neighborhood, school and at home. The television show left the airwaves in 1963.
